text: (viśvāsavantayini!) dharmaya pahaḷa karanu læbūvangen kavurun allāhvada avasāna dinayada viśvāsa nokarada, allāhda ohugē dūtayāda tahanam karanu læbū dæya sudusu nætæyi yanna adahas nokarada, mema satya dharmaya anugamanaya nokara siṭinnōda, ovun (tamangē) atvalin yaṭahatva jisyā (namæti kappam) gevana turu oba ovun samaga yuddha karanu
